title: Aural set, Slavonic dance - change in 2nd phrase

content.description: You will hear an orchestral excerpt consisting of a brief introduction and two extended phrases. The introduction and first phrase will be played twice; then the entire excerpt will be played twice. Before listening to the introduction and first phrase for the first time, please read the questions.
content.question: In relation to the first phrase, which of the following elements changes in the second phrase?

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

topic.text: 4.3: Harmonic Progression, Functional Harmony, and Cadences

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Use symbols and terms to describe melodic, harmonic, and rhythmic relationships in performed music. (This skill is applied in describing these elements in a full musical context.)
